  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/2900</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Halloween</string>
            <string language="en">Halloween</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Halloween</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Halloween</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Halloween</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Halloween</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αποκριές</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Miniunitat didàctica (MUD) interactiva sobre la festa de Halloween que treballa l'estructura "Let's" per suggerir o convidar. Inclou exercicis interactius d'identificació  i comprensió, així com suport auditiu a les activitats de comprensió lectora i dos enllaços a altres pàgines web per ampliar el contingut temàtic.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive mini teaching unit (MUD) on Halloween using the structure "Let's" for suggesting or inviting. It includes interactive exercises, as well as aural backup to reading comprehension activities and two links to other websites on the same subject.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">festa</string>
            <string language="en">celebration</string>
            <string language="es">fiesta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">cultura</string>
            <string language="en">culture</string>
            <string language="es">cultura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">llengua anglesa</string>
            <string language="en">English language</string>
            <string language="es">lengua inglesa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">comprensió oral</string>
            <string language="en">listening comprehension</string>
            <string language="es">comprensión oral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">comprensió lectora</string>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">vocabulari</string>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
            <string language="es">vocabulario</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive unterrichtende Minimaßeinheit 
(SCHLAMM) auf Halloween, welches die Struktur "verwendet, ließ uns" 
für das Vorschlagen oder das Einladen. Sie schließt 
interaktive Übungen, sowie Ohrenbackup zu den 
Leseerfassenaktivitäten und zwei Links zu anderen Web site auf dem 
gleichen Thema ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La mini unité d'enseignement interactive (BOUE) 
sur Halloween utilisant la structure "nous a laissés" pour suggérer 
ou inviter. Elle inclut des exercices interactifs, aussi bien 
que la sauvegarde auditive aux activités de compréhension de lecture
et deux liens à d'autres sites Web sur le même sujet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A unidade ensinando mini interativa (LAMA) em 
Halloween que usa a estrutura "deixou-nos" para sugerir ou convidar. 
Inclui exercícios interativos, as.well.as o apoio aural às 
atividades da compreensão da leitura e as duas ligações a outros 
Web site no mesmo assunto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La mini unità d'istruzione interattiva (FANGO) su 
Halloween che usando la struttura "li ha lasciati" per il suggerimento
o invitare. Include le esercitazioni interattive, così come 
recupero sonoro alle attività di comprensione della lettura e due 
collegamenti ad altri Web site sul medesimo argomento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η διαλογική μίνι μονάδα διδασκαλίας (ΛΑΣΠΗ) σε 
αποκριές που χρησιμοποιούν τη δομή "" για την υποβολή προτάσεων 
ή την πρόσκληση. Περιλαμβάνει τις διαλογικές ασκήσεις, 
καθώς επίσης και ακουστικό στήριγμα στις δραστηριότητες 
κατανόησης ανάγνωσης και δύο συνδέσεις με άλλους ιστοχώρους στο 
ίδιο θέμα.</string>
          </description>
